title: Mass Effect Legendary Edition Early Impressions! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.14.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Mass Effect, Sega working on a super game, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start - The Mass Effect.
00:12:28 - Will this re-release give BioWare some of its credibility back? - Best Friends Q:Jordan Lee Rowan
00:18:19 - Housekeeping

TODAY at 2PM PT on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames: Greg, Nick, Mike, Joey, and Barrett are playing Poker Club and giving away a WHOLE bunch of codes for the game. AND If you watch you can get a custom Kinda Funny Trophy and KF merch in game!

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock

The Roper Report -
00:19:20 - Sega says it plans to release a ‘Super Game’ within the next five years - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:30:20 - Discord Is Evolving Beyond Gaming, but is still excited to work with PlayStation - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:35:18 - Housemarque’s searching for a solution for Returnal’s no-save-option problem - Kat Bailey @ IGN
00:43:00 - Ad  
00:46:40 - Microsoft rolls out Dolby Vision gaming test on Xbox Series X and S - Jon Porter @ The Verge
00:51:15 - Disco Elysium: The Final Cut finally cleared for release in Australia - Marie Deallesandri @ GiBiz
00:53:20 - Ghostrunner 2 has been announced! - Marcus Stewart @ GameInformer
00:55:20 - Out today
 Reader mail -
00:56:40 - What is your personal over/under on us seeing any kind of studio acquisition announcement and who do you think it would be? - Parker Petrov
01:04:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Greg and Kahlief
Wednesday: Blessing and Andy
Thursday: Greg and Steve Saylor
Friday: Blessing and Greg
